Package ohos.agp.render.render3d.components

Class SceneComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.render.render3d.components.SceneComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component

    public class SceneComponent
extends Object
implements Component
    Represent the scene component.

    You can use this class to define component attributes, such as the diffuse and specular color.

    Since:
    3

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  SceneComponent.BackgroundType
      Defines the type of the background displayed in a scene.

      • getIrradianceCoefficients

        public Vector3[] getIrradianceCoefficients​()
        Obtains the irradiance lighting coefficients.
        Returns:
        Returns the irradiance lighting coefficients.

      • setIrradianceCoefficients

        public void setIrradianceCoefficients​(Vector3[] irradianceCoefficients)
        Sets the irradiance lighting coefficients. For Lambertian diffuse, you are advised to prescale the coefficients with 1.0/PI.
        Parameters:
        irradianceCoefficients - Indicates the irradiance lighting coefficients to set.
